trends: There have been 579 other sightings in New York
There was one other sighting in New York on or around December 22nd 1973
divs: Sighting DetailsI WAS ON MY HOME FROM WORK -A CORRECTION OFFICER AT THE TIME-I WAS DRIVEING -ALONG ROUTE 1OO IN WESTCHESTER COUNTY ALONG A RESERVOIR-WHEN I SPOTTED A RED LIGHT-THOUGHT NOTHING OF IT -AS I LOOK AT IT AGAIN-WAS RED AND WHITE-THOUGHT IT WAS A PLANE -BUT THE MORE I LOOK UP IT SAW IT TAKING SHAPE WAS OVAL -I STOP MY CAR TO GET A BETTER LOOK AT IT !!I WAS NOT ALONE ,THE OTHER PERSON ALSO A CORRECTION OFFICER WAS SCARED -HE SAID DONT STOP-I DID -TOLD HIM GET OUT THIS IS SOMETHING U WILL NEVER SEE . SO CLOSE-I RAN ACROSS THE ROAD-WAS ALONE ;THE CRAFT CAME IN LIKE A FALLING LEAF .QUIET-BRIGHT RED AND WHITE LIGHTS-THE CRAFT STOP OVER THE WATER I SAY 20 FT ABOVE IT-AND THEN IN FLASH SHOT ACROSS THE RESERVOIR SO FAST GONE IN A SECOND-I WAS ABOUT TO LEAVE -WHEN I SAW CLOUDS OR SMOKE COMMING DOWN - A 2-CRAFT SHAPE LIKE A MISSLE CAME DOWN VERY FAST IN THE SAME SPOT WERE THE OTHER WAS -FOR ABOUT 10 SECONDS WAS THERE-THEN IT SHOT STRAIGHT UP IN A FLASH TOO. THIS UFO WAS QUIET TOO WITH A RED GLOW- HAVE TO SAY ,WHAT WERE THEY UP TOO - MAYBE THEY NOTICED ME AND ABORTED THERE LANDING ???
